text: In Portugal, ENES is an acronym for 'Exames Nacionais do Ensino Secundário' (Secondary Education National Exams). Specifically, the ENES Sheet is a document containing the students final secondary education classification (GPA) as well as the exam results of the "provas específicas" (specific exams) used to apply to university or polytechnical institutions. ==See also== *Higher education in Portugal *Education in Portugal Category:Education in Portugal
title: Exames Nacionais do Ensino Secundário
